page.title: 06Large Abattoir,near Wootton
page.content:
There is a large abattoir and meat processing plant about a mile from Wootton. It employs 318 workers and some jobs have been lost recently after the company was sold. An incredible number of animals are slaughtered every week: 580 cattle, 2000 lambs and 3500 pigs. The animals are made drowsy before they are killed.
Meat is prepared for the company's shops as well as for some supermarket chains.The hides, bones and offal are also processed in various ways. There could be changes in the meat trade as many of the public prefer leaner meat. The cattle now have to be fed differently. There also seems to be a trend against meat eating among some people.
